content: the black cherry ear warmer is an easy twisted ear warmer crochet pattern featuring a lot of texture i love the texture in this ear warmer - you will find big bobble stitches and ridge stitches that are created by working in the third loop a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ a free written copy of this pattern can be found here https //richtexturescrochet com/ black-cherry-ear-warmer-crochet-pattern skill level easy gauge 12 sts x 12 row of half_double_crochet in 3rd = 4 inches finished size 9 x 4 5 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference to fit an adult head yarn scarfie ® by lion brand ® 78% acrylic 22% wool 5 3 oz 150 g approx 312 yds 285 m bulky weight 5 1/3 ball colour shown is cranberry/black hook size k/10 5 6 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
